jibe.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: an unkind remark intended to make someone seem silly
jibe.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: She was tired of his cheap jibes.
jibe.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: if two statements, reports etc jibe with each other, the information in them matches
jibe.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: His report did not jibe with the facts.
jibe.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to say something that is intended to make someone seem silly
